dataset_id: DMSP SSM/I-SSMIS Pathfinder Daily EASE-Grid Brightness Temperatures V002
title: DMSP SSM/I-SSMIS Pathfinder Daily EASE-Grid Brightness Temperatures V002
summary: This Level-3 Equal-Area Scalable Earth-Grid (EASE-Grid) Brightness Temperature data set, collected since 09 July 1987, is a part of the NOAA/NASA Pathfinder Program. The data set consists of gridded data from the Special Sensor Microwave/Imager (SSM/I) and the Special Sensor Microwave Imager/Sounder (SSMIS) in three equal-area projections: Northern Hemisphere, Southern Hemisphere, and full global.
